source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_TALK_ACTOR<tab>
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_TALK_ACTOR<tab>0

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_000<tab>Up to something? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake! And I can fashion you a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> convincing guise for the masquerade. Ehehehe...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_000<tab>キキキ……私は「変身の奇術」が得意な、しがないインプ。
私のとっておきの力で、あなたが頭に思い浮かべた人物に、
変身させてみせましょう！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_001<tab>All I need is your memory of someone, someone who made a <var 1A 02 /var>strong<var 1A 01 /var> impression. Someone unforgettable, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_001<tab>ささ、これまでの冒険の中で、出会った人々の中から、
強い印象を受けた方をイメージするのです！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_002<tab>All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what you see...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_002<tab>それではァ、まず、これまでの冒険を思い起こしてください！
キキキ……さあ、何がみえてきましたかな～？

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_001<tab>A journey to forge this realm anew.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_001<tab>新生の冒険

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_002<tab>A journey to end a conflict of one thousand years.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_002<tab>蒼天の冒険

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_003<tab>A journey to liberate lands near and far.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_003<tab>紅蓮の冒険

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_004<tab>A journey to reclaim the night sky.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A1_000_004<tab>漆黒の冒険

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_003<tab>Good, good. Now think of someone remarkable you encountered in that time, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_003<tab>では、そんな冒険の中で出会った人々の中から、
強い印象を受けた方をイメージするのです！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_001<tab>A Padjali woman as gentle yet indomitable as nature itself.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_001<tab>おっとりとしているが、芯の強そうな角尊の女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_002<tab>A stalwart Roegadyn woman of unshakable conviction.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_002<tab>揺るぎない信念と自信に満ちた、ルガディンの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_003<tab>A rugged Hyuran man unmatched in loyalty and valor.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_003<tab>勇猛で闘志あふれる、ヒューランの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_004<tab>A charming and compassionate Lalafellin lady of noble birth.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_004<tab>桃色の髪が可愛らしい、高貴なララフェルの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_005<tab>A courageous and clever Garlean man admired by many.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_005<tab>魔導技術に長け、部下から慕われるガレアンの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_006<tab>A wry and ambitious Garlean man who hates to be outdone.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_006<tab>野心が強く、つかみどころがないガレアンの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_007<tab>An eccentric Miqo'te man crimson of both hair and eye.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_007<tab>赤髪と紅い瞳を持つ、ミコッテの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_008<tab>A proud Elezen man unmatched in the art of the lance.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_008<tab>類まれな槍さばきを誇る、孤高のエレゼンの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_009<tab>A blue-eyed Elezen man with a heart noble and true.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_009<tab>黒髪で蒼い瞳に強い意志が宿る、エレゼンの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_010<tab>A tenacious half-Elezen woman who fights for what is just.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_010<tab>正義感が強く凛々しい、ハーフエレゼンの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_011<tab>A robed Lalafellin woman of the intellectual persuasion.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_011<tab>黄色の耳付きローブをまとった、ララフェルの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_012<tab>A daring Hyuran man who lives free as a bird.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_012<tab>空賊を率い、自由を愛するヒューランの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_013<tab>A dauntless Hyuran man of integrity from the Far East.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_013<tab>潔くも大らかな、東方のヒューランの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_014<tab>A devoted Auri woman who has mastered the art of the shinobi.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_014<tab>忍びの技に長け、忠義を尽くすアウラの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_015<tab>A haughty but valorous Auri man with a yearning heart.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_015<tab>尊大にして武勇に優れた、独り身のアウラの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_016<tab>An Auri woman strong of body and stronger of will.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_016<tab>勝気で豪快な、誇り高きアウラの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_017<tab>A sweet Auri woman who lives according to her faith.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_017<tab>可憐で儚げな、神託に従って生きるアウラの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_018<tab>A crimson-garbed Hyuran woman fleet of foot and fist.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_018<tab>真紅の衣装をまとい、体術に長けたヒューランの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_019<tab>A Hyuran man whose strength and compassion made him a legend.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_019<tab>聖獣に慕われていた、かつての英雄であるヒューランの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_020<tab>A vindictive Hyuran man of savage political cunning.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_020<tab>全権大使を務める、感情的なヒューランの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_021<tab>A sagacious Miqo'te woman skilled in the magical arts.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_021<tab>魔女を名乗る、聡明なミコッテの女性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_022<tab>An Elezen man who reads the stars as easily as his tomes.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_022<tab>星を読み運命を切り開く、寡黙なエレゼンの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_023<tab>A handsome Hyuran man who fights to protect those he loves.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_023<tab>ガンブレードを操る、男気溢れたヒューランの男性

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_024<tab>A dainty Hyuran woman who chose to carve her own fate.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_024<tab>数奇な運命を背負う、青すぎる瞳を持つヒューランの少女

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_025<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_A2_000_025<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_004<tab>Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_004<tab>キキキ……みえました、みえましたよ！
それではお待ちかね、特別な奇術をかけますヨ！！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The transfiguration can be removed by leaving the area, or by canceling the “Transfiguration” status effect.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>「変身状態」を解除したい場合には、
専用アクションである「変身解除」を使用することで、
元の状態に戻ることができます。

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_010<tab>Pay no mind to this little imp! I'm <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> busy during the Wake─I've no time for mundane mummers, no.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_010<tab>おや……あなた、本当にパーティの招待客ですか？
ダンチョーからは、なにも聞いていませんが……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_011<tab>Come back with word from the Impresario...or not at all. Ehehehe...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2019TRANSFORM_00627_RANSFORMHLW2019_000_011<tab>申し訳ないですが、私の「変身の奇術」は、
正規の招待客の方にしか、おかけできないんですヨ。
